entities.name: FOUNDRIES
entities.description: Independent entities that manufacture semiconductor wafers using their fabrication equipment and techniques for the company.

entities.name: SUBCONTRACTORS
entities.description: Independent entities contracted by the company to assemble, test, or package their products.

entities.name: SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT TOOLS
entities.description: Third-party tools relied upon by the company to assist in design, simulation, and verification of new products or product enhancements.

entities.name: SUPPLIERS
entities.description: Entities that provide wafers, components, and capacity to the company.

entities.name: CONTRACT MANUFACTURERS
entities.description: Entities that manufacture or test products for the company.

relationships.relationship_description: Foundries are part of the supply chain providing semiconductor wafers and capacity to the company.
Subcontractors are part of the supply chain providing assembly, test, and packaging services to the company.
Software development tools assist in the design and verification of products, which are part of the supply chain.
Contract manufacturers are part of the supply chain providing manufacturing and testing services to the company.
Foundries provide raw materials and manufacturing processes to contract manufacturers.
Foundries provide semiconductor wafers to subcontractors for assembly, testing, and packaging.
Contract manufacturers and subcontractors both play a role in the production and testing process.
